posts.title: Kuensel Editorial: The government’s decision to rev...
posts.description: Kuensel Editorial: The government’s decision to revise taxation on alcohol and tobacco products is a long-overdue step in the fight against non-communicable diseases (NCDs). The country is losing 72 percent of its population to illnesses that are preventable—diseases linked not to fate, but to lifestyle choices and substances we willingly consume. Stronger taxes on harmful products is not just a revenue measure, it is an act of national self-preservation. https://kuenselonline.com/news/taxing-harm-to-save-lives #NCDs #taxing #editorial #Bhutan
